name: Senior PPC Specialist / Ведущий специалист по контекстной рекламе
description:
Brane is a global marketing company based in Singapore. We help growth-stage products to build and execute user acquisition strategy. We are the trusted partner of 100+ leading companies as Facebook, eBay, Alibaba Group, King and others.

Now we are looking for a Senior PPC Specialist to join one of our dedicated teams (full-time focused on just one project). Your main responsibilities will be managing campaigns: analysing, making new ones and increasing overall effectiveness.

What you’ll be doing:

  • Launch and manage Google Ads campaigns (Paid Search, Display, YouTube);

  • Analyse data and optimise campaigns (20+ countries);

  • Launch A/B Testing Campaigns;

  • Identify new market opportunities;

  • A/B test new and unique ideas based on a deep understanding of data to improve conversion rates, CTR, CPA, ROI and other success metrics.

What you’ll bring:

  • Expert knowledge of Google Ads advertising platforms;

  • Strong knowledge of Google Analytics platform;

  • Strong analytical skills and data-driven mindset;

  • Strong understanding of attribution, ROI, CPA, CPL etc;

  • Experience with A/B testing landing pages;

  • Hands-on experience in managing monthly campaigns budgets at least $100k+

  • Experience in finance is a plus;

  • Marketing or technical background is a plus.

What you’ll get:

  • Remote work culture
  • Competitive compensation packages
  • Flexible working hours
